contact.title: Legal
contact.content: For any questions regarding this legal notice, you can contact us at: legal@pilotys.io

confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
confidentialite.description: How PILOTYS processes and protects your personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: PILOTYS is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how your personal data is processed when you use the service.

dataCollection.title: Data Processing
dataCollection.content:
PILOTYS processes only the data strictly necessary to provide access to the service, including:
- Account information (email address, authentication data)
- Technical connection data required for security and service operation

Content provided by the user (such as meeting notes, decisions or texts) is processed only at the explicit request of the user and is not stored durably by PILOTYS.

audioTranscription.title: Audio Transcription of Meetings
audioTranscription.content:
PILOTYS offers an audio transcription feature to automatically generate meeting minutes.

**Consent and Authorization**
Users must confirm that they have informed participants and obtained their authorization before recording and transcribing a meeting. Users are responsible for obtaining necessary authorizations in accordance with applicable legislation.

**Audio Data Processing**
- Audio files are processed on our secure Whisper servers (hosted in Europe if configured)
- Audio is automatically deleted after transcription (within 24 hours maximum)
- Only the text transcription is retained, as long as the project exists
- Access to audio and transcription is limited to the owner user and authorized project members

**Security and Protection Measures**
We apply security and privacy measures to protect your data:
- Audio files are never logged or stored permanently
- Only metadata (date, duration, size) is recorded for technical tracking
- Transcribed content is protected by the same security measures as other user data
- Option to anonymize sensitive data (emails, phone numbers, IBAN) available

**Retention and Deletion**
- Retention policy: Audio is deleted within 24 hours after transcription. Transcription is retained as long as the project exists.
- You can delete audio and transcription at any time from your account
- Deletion is permanent and irreversible

**Your Rights**
In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase and restrict processing of your data. To exercise these rights, contact us at legal@pilotys.io

dataUsage.title: Purpose of Processing
dataUsage.content:
Personal data is processed exclusively to:
- Provide access to the PILOTYS service
- Execute the functionalities explicitly requested by the user
- Ensure the security, maintenance and proper operation of the service
- Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

dataProtection.title: Data Security
dataProtection.content: PILOTYS implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, loss or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content:
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
- Right of access
- Right to rectification
- Right to erasure
- Right to restriction of processing

Requests can be submitted at any time.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any question regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us at: legal@pilotys.io

cgu.title: Terms of Use
cgu.description: Terms of use of the PILOTYS platform

acceptance.title: Acceptance of the Terms
acceptance.content: Accessing and using the PILOTYS platform implies full and unconditional acceptance of these Terms of Use.

service.title: Service Description
service.content:
PILOTYS is an online software application (SaaS) designed for managing projects, decisions and professional actions. The service is intended as a decision-support and organizational tool.

The service is provided "as is" and may be modified or updated at any time for technical, functional or maintenance reasons.

account.title: User Account
account.content: Use of PILOTYS requires the creation of a user account using a valid email address. The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials and for all activities carried out under their account.

usage.title: Permitted Use
usage.content:
The user agrees to use PILOTYS solely in a lawful and professional manner. It is strictly prohibited to:
- use the service for illegal or fraudulent purposes
- attempt to access other users' data
- disrupt or compromise the proper functioning of the platform

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
All elements of the PILOTYS platform (software, interface, design, brand, content) are protected by intellectual property laws and remain the exclusive property of Rania MOUTAWAFIQ, operating under the trade name PILOTYS.

All content provided or processed by the user remains the property of the user.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content:
PILOTYS is a decision-support tool. The publisher does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or relevance of the information generated or processed through the service.

The user remains solely responsible for any decisions, actions or uses made based on information obtained via PILOTYS. The publisher shall not be held liable for any indirect damages, data loss, financial loss or commercial harm.

modifications.title: Changes to the Terms
modifications.content: These Terms of Use may be modified at any time. The applicable version is the one in force at the time the service is used.

cgv.title: Terms of Sale
cgv.description: Terms governing subscriptions and paid services of PILOTYS

scope.title: Scope
scope.content: These Terms of Sale apply to all paid subscriptions and services offered by PILOTYS to professional users.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Subscription prices are indicated in euros, exclusive of taxes unless otherwise stated. PILOTYS reserves the right to modify its pricing at any time. Any price change will not apply to an ongoing subscription period.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.content: Subscriptions are concluded for a fixed period (monthly or annual) and are automatically renewed unless cancelled by the user prior to the end of the current billing period.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Payments are processed via Stripe, a secure third-party payment service provider. Payment is due immediately upon subscription. PILOTYS does not store any payment card information.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.content: The user may cancel their subscription at any time from their account settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current subscription period, with no interruption of service during that period.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.content: Subscriptions grant immediate access to the PILOTYS service. As such, no refunds are issued for any subscription period already started, except where mandatory under applicable law.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding subscriptions or billing, you may contact us at: billing@pilotys.io

hero.title: Your meeting decisions
hero.titleHighlight: no longer get lost in notes
hero.subtitle: PILOTYS transforms your meeting minutes into tracked decisions and followed actions. Who does what, when, and what's blocking. Finally, traceability.
hero.ctaMicroCopy: No credit card â€¢ Get started in 2 minutes

intro.text: PILOTYS transforms your meeting minutes into documented decisions and assigned actions. You know who does what, when, and what's blocking. Finally, traceability between meeting and execution.

problemSolution.title: Before PILOTYS vs With PILOTYS?
problemSolution.subtitle: The problem you know, the solution you need

before.title: Before PILOTYS
points: Lost decisions : What did we decide again?
Vague actions : Who should do this? By when?
No tracking : Is it progressing? Where are we?
Repetitive meetings : We already talked about this...

after.title: With PILOTYS
points: Tracked decisions : Every decision is documented with its context
Assigned actions : Clear owner, deadline, status
Real-time tracking : Dashboard, Kanban, roadmap to see progress
Effective meetings : Weekly Review to take stock and move forward

features.title: Powerful features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to transform your meetings into tracked decisions and executed actions

workflow.title: How does it work?
workflow.subtitle: From your meeting to executed action, in 4 simple steps

weeklyReview.title: Integrated Weekly Review
weeklyReview.subtitle: Every week, take time to reflect on your accomplishments, identify decisions to make, and plan the next week. A powerful ritual to improve your productivity and mental clarity.

monthlyReview.title: Integrated Monthly Review
monthlyReview.subtitle: Every month, review your projects, analyze trends, and adjust your strategy. A monthly ritual to step back and pilot effectively.

bilan.title: Complete monthly review
bilan.description: Analyze the progress of all your projects, decisions, and actions over the past month.

tendances.title: Trends and metrics
tendances.description: Visualize trends, identify recurring blockers, and adjust your strategy.

cta.title: Ready to transform your meetings into results?

traceableActions.title: Traceable actions

progressTracking.title: Progress tracking

weeklyReview.title: Weekly Review
weeklyReview.description: Reflect on your week, identify decisions to make, and plan the next one.

visualRoadmap.description: Plan your projects with clear, shareable roadmaps with your team.

step1.title: Centralize your meetings
step1.description: Connect Outlook or import your meeting minutes. All your meetings in one place.

step2.title: Extract decisions and actions
step2.description: Paste your meeting minutes. PILOTYS automatically identifies decisions made and actions to take.

step3.title: Assign and document
step3.description: For each action: assign an owner, set a deadline, add context. Every decision is documented.

step4.title: Track and pilot
step4.description: Dashboard, Kanban, roadmap: visualize what's moving forward, what's blocked, what's overdue. Weekly Review to take stock.

reflection.title: Reflection
reflection.description: Analyze your past week and identify key points.

decisions.title: Decisions
decisions.description: List important decisions to make for the next week.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Create your actions and define your priorities for the coming week.

benefits: Total visibility : You see who does what, when, and what's blocking
Accountability : Every action has a clear owner

benefits: Tracked decisions : No more "what did we decide?"
